events.info: Born on 1st October 1925 in Radomsko, Poland, to parents Abram Dawid and Fajgla Ajgenberg.
Parents and siblings killed during the Holocaust.
Escaped from the Radomsko ghetto and assumed the identity of Stanislaw Wierzba to survive.
Returned to Warsaw after liberation and began working in a mechanical workshop.
Legally changed his name from Israel Jozef Ajgenberg to Stanislaw Wierzba.
Became active in Jewish organizations, including the Association of Jewish War Veterans and Victims of Persecutions during World War Two.
Interviewed by Centropa, sharing his life story and experiences.
